sentences.en: “I've ripped him off as much as I could possibly rip him off”(&b{Gary Fisketjon})
sentences.cn: “我尽最大可能从那儿偷我所需要的东西”(&b{加里·菲斯克特荣})

sentences.en: "Yaaaaaaa," Carla let rip with the cry of the Valkyries.
sentences.cn: “呀——”卡拉放开喉咙，发出女武神瓦尔基里一般的嘶喊声。

sentences.en: a false advertising campaign that ripped off a great many consumers.
sentences.cn: 欺骗了大多数消费者的虚假广告活动

sentences.en: Between these islands there is a rip.
sentences.cn: 在这些岛屿之间有一道大浪.

sentences.en: He had seen the rip in the book.
sentences.cn: 他看到了书里的裂缝.

sentences.en: He must subdue her, absorb her, rip her apart and consume her.
sentences.cn: 他立意要征服她, 吞了她, 不惜把她撕碎把她榨干.

sentences.en: Her clothes had all been ripped.
sentences.cn: 她的衣服都被撕破了。

sentences.en: I asked my mother to sew up this rip in my sleeve.
sentences.cn: 我让母亲缝上我袖子上的裂缝.

sentences.en: I'll rip your gut string loose with this f - k - g bar.
sentences.cn: 我就拿这根钢筋把你肚肠捅个稀烂.

sentences.en: If he thinks £5.40 a day for parking at Luton Airport is a rip-off, he should try Heathrow.
sentences.cn: 如果他觉得在卢顿机场停车一天收费5.40英镑太高的话，他应该在希思罗机场停车试试。

sentences.en: If they disputed his allegation, Paul would rip into them with every foul word you could imagine.
sentences.cn: 如果他们对他的陈述提出质疑，保罗会用你能想象得到的各种肮脏词汇攻击他们。

sentences.en: If we wrote I think he would rip up the letter.
sentences.cn: 如果我们写信的话，我想他会把信撕得粉碎。

sentences.en: Impatiently, Sue ripped the letter open .
sentences.cn: 休急不可待地撕开信封。

sentences.en: Looking at the rip in her new dress, she flew into a rage.
sentences.cn: 看到新连衣裙上的口子，她勃然大怒。

sentences.en: Rip the cover off this box.
sentences.cn: 撕开这个盒盖.

sentences.en: ripped into her opponent's political record.
sentences.cn: 猛烈攻击对手的政治经历

sentences.en: She ripped off a leather jacket while ostensibly trying on clothes.
sentences.cn: 她在假装试衣服的时候偷了一件皮夹克

sentences.en: the brass sections let rip with sheer gusto.
sentences.cn: 铜管乐器组倾情演奏。

sentences.en: The ecological disaster is partly a product of letting everything rip in order to increase production.
sentences.cn: 出现生态灾难的部分原因是人们为了增产而不惜一切代价。

sentences.en: The sail ripped under the force of the wind.
sentences.cn: 船帆被狂风刮破了。

sentences.en: they have ripped off £6.7 billion.
sentences.cn: 他们偷了67亿英镑。

sentences.en: Try to rip it apart as rapidly as possible.
sentences.cn: 动作尽可能快地把它撕开。

sentences.en: Turn the guitars up full and let rip.
sentences.cn: 把吉他的音量调到最大，尽情欢乐吧。

sentences.en: Underneath this image of normalcy, addiction threatened to rip this family apart.
sentences.cn: 在这一切正常的表象下潜伏的是将使这个家庭四分五裂的毒瘾。

phrases.tran_cn: ◎不要担心；别理会后果；听其自然
(非正式)全力以赴；无拘无束行事，自由自在地行动
(非正式)让…（尤指车辆）全速前进
猛烈攻击，抨击：猛烈地攻击或抨击
(非正式)欺诈（尤指骗钱）；敲…竹杠

trans.tran_cn: 裂口，废物，[美国俚语]偷窃，浪子

trans.tran_en: to tear something or be torn quickly and violently
to tear something or be torn quickly and violently

trans.tran_cn: 撕成，锯，猛地扯开，拆（衣服）
trans.tran_en: to tear something or be torn quickly and violently
